attributes.action: Public buses to ALL have SEAT BELTS IN UNITED KINGDOM,MAKE THIS LAW IMMEDIATELY.
attributes.additional_details: Please SIGN IMMEDIATELY, lets together be safe, heard, legal laws in place that all children, elderly, disabled,mums to be, (ALL PUBLIC ) NOT be VUNERABLE  on a UK bus. PLANES in air have seat belts, make LAW buses on our roads have INSTALLED SAFETY MEASURES SEAT BELTS AND CAMERAS TOO. I am here still to tell my horrific story, but now I must ask for PARLIAMENT  to bring in this URGENT LAW LONG OVER DUE AND CLUNK, CLICK, EVERY TRIP. Young children do not understand their rights, BUT ADULTS DO.
attributes.background: Myself recently INJURED  in 7 places on my body, due to being on a bus with NO SEAT BELTS IN, CHANGE A MUST NOW,I could have gone through side of bus window, sitting at front and on incident I landed down the middle of bus heavy impact landing on my lower spine,wacking chairs either side constantly(
